comment.body:
While that's a great initiative,  it still bugs me that their browser remains proprietary. 

Seriously, Opera, throw the towel already. Give back to the community in a way we all can benefit.

> [redacted](#comment_1_19qsuxKBkNZWYft3epWgn6u3gG82sQHs6n): Back them up into ZeroNet and/or IPFS!

Yes! Upload them to the perpetual web :)
